summary: Two boxing promoters compete to sign-up Mexican-American prizefighter Johnny Monterez who, despite his talent, is ashamed of his heritage and boxes on borrowed time due to a permanent hand injury.
cast: June Allyson|Dick Powell|Ricardo Montalban|Lionel Barrymore|Teresa Celli|Barry Kelley|Tom Powers|Mimi Aguglia|Marianne Stewart|John Gallaudet|Wally Maher|Larry Keating|Kenneth Tobey|Bert Davidson|John Hamilton|Jackie Barnett|Margaret Bert|Robert Board|Lynton Brent|William Cabanne|James Carlisle|Steve Carruthers|Mack Chandler|Russ Clark|Harry Cody|James Conaty|Chester Conklin|Gene Coogan|John Crawford|Jack Daley|Edgar Dearing|King Donovan|Juan Duval|Franklyn Farnum|Frank Ferguson|David Fresco|Sig Frohlich|Tommy Garland|Kenneth Gibson|Kit Guard|Tom Hanlon|Jim Hayward|Al Hill|Joseph La Cava|Thomas Martin|John Maxwell|Harold Miller|John Mitchum|Marilyn Monroe|Bert Moorhouse|Jimmy O'Gatty|Robert Osterloh|Ted Pavelec|Bob Perry|Charles Perry|James Pierce|Suzanne Ridgway|Dewey Robinson|Cosmo Sardo|Harry Shannon|Court Shepard|George Sherwood|Eddie Lou Simms|Cap Somers|Harry Stanton|Robert R. Stephenson|Smoki Whitfield|June Whitley Taylor|Ulysses Williams
title: Cruce de derecha
